name: ES-JOBS-Category_ComercialYVentas

name: ES-IJ-Men
description: Segmento de usuarios hombres

definition.query: trait('gender') = 'MALE'

description: Segmento de usuarios de entre 35 y 44 años

definition.query: event('Offer Result List Viewed').where(property('site') = 'infojobs.net' AND property('offer_study_level') = 'Enseñanzas artísticas (regladas)').within(60 days).count() >= 1 OR trait('academic_level') = 'Enseñanzas artísticas (regladas)'

name: ES-IJ-AcademicLevel_EnseñanzasDeportivas
description: Segmento de usuarios con Nivel de estudios en Enseñanzas Deportivas regladas

definition.query: trait('academic_level') = 'Enseñanzas deportivas (regladas)' OR event('Offer Result List Viewed').where(property('site') = 'infojobs.net' AND property('offer_study_level') = 'Enseñanzas deportivas (regladas)').within(60 days).count() >= 1

name: Usuarios unicos FC no App Anonymous
description: Audience created via API

definition.query: trait('unique_users_from_fotocasa_with_anonymous') = 'true' AND NOT (event('Detail Loaded').within(365 days).count() >= 1 OR event('List Loaded').within(365 days).count() >= 1)

name: Usuarios unicos FC Anonymous sin app last 30 days
description: Audience created via API

name: ES-IJ-Users Android & then Users iOS Last 365 days
description: se considera user android si ha visto la home o la pg de resultados, lo mismo para user iOS

definition.query: event('Offer Result List Viewed').where(property('platform') = 'app android' AND property('vertical') = 'jobs' AND event('Home Viewed').where(property('platform') = 'app ios' AND property('vertical') = 'jobs').within(parent: 365 days).count() >= 1).within(365 days).count() >= 1 OR event('Offer Result List Viewed').where(property('platform') = 'app android' AND property('vertical') = 'jobs' AND event('Offer Result List Viewed').where(property('platform') = 'app ios' AND property('vertical') = 'jobs').within(parent: 365 days).count() >= 1).within(365 days).count() >= 1 OR event('Home Viewed').where(property('platform') = 'app android' AND property('vertical') = 'jobs' AND event('Home Viewed').where(property('platform') = 'app ios' AND property('vertical') = 'jobs').within(parent: 365 days).count() >= 1).within(365 days).count() >= 1 OR event('Home Viewed').where(property('platform') = 'app android' AND property('vertical') = 'jobs' AND event('Offer Result List Viewed').where(context('platform') = 'app ios' AND property('vertical') = 'jobs').within(parent: 365 days).count() >= 1).within(365 days).count() >= 1

name: ES-IJ-Keyword_finanzas_banca
description: Segmento de usuarios de infojobs que contienen la keyword finance finanzas banca contable

definition.query: event('Offer Result List Viewed').where(property('site') = 'infojobs.net' AND property('keyword').contains('financier')).within(60 days).count() >= 1 OR event('Offer Result List Viewed').where(property('site') = 'infojobs.net' AND property('keyword').contains('banca')).within(60 days).count() >= 1 OR event('Offer Result List Viewed').where(property('site') = 'infojobs.net' AND property('keyword').contains('finanzas')).within(60 days).count() >= 1 OR event('Offer Result List Viewed').where(property('site') = 'infojobs.net' AND property('keyword').contains('contable')).within(60 days).count() >= 1

name: ES-IJ-Keyword_Marketing
description: Segmento de usuarios con la Keyword Marketing en Infojobs

definition.query: event('Offer Result List Viewed').where(property('site') = 'infojobs.net' AND property('keyword').contains('marketing')).within(60 days).count() >= 1

name: ES-JOBS-Category_MarketingYComunicacion
description: Segmento de usuarios interesados en ofertas o con categoría Marketing y Comunicación para Infojobs y Milanuncios

definition.query: event('Offer Result List Viewed').where(property('site') = 'infojobs.net' AND property('category_level1').contains('Marketing y comunicación')).within(60 days).count() >= 1 OR event('Detail Viewed').where(property('site') = 'infojobs.net' AND property('category_level1') = 'Marketing y comunicación').within(60 days).count() >= 1 OR event('List Viewed').where(property('site') = 'milanuncios' AND property('category_level1') = 'Empleo' AND property('category_level2') = 'Marketing').within(60 days).count() >= 1 OR event('Detail Viewed').where(property('site') = 'milanuncios' AND property('category_level1') = 'Empleo' AND property('category_level2') = 'Marketing').within(60 days).count() >= 1 OR event('List Loaded').where(property('site') = 'milanuncios' AND property('category_level1') = 'Empleo' AND property('category_level2') = 'Marketing').within(60 days).count() >= 1 OR event('Detail Loaded').where(property('site') = 'milanuncios' AND property('category_level1') = 'Empleo' AND property('category_level2') = 'Marketing').within(60 days).count() >= 1

name: ES-IJ-User_CV_Desempleado
